question: 協力
partsOfSpeech: noun, する verb, の adjective
sourceMnemonic: <kanji>Cooperation</kanji> <kanji>power</kanji> is your level of <vocabulary>cooperation</vocabulary>. It's how much <vocabulary>collaboration</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>assistance</vocabulary> you provide.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
